description:
“Yuu-chan, you’re good at drawing.”
Minami-chan takes a peek at Yuu-chan’s notebook. 
When Minami-chan finds out Yuu-chan likes drawing pictures and manga, Yuu-chan hides her notebook, embarrassed. 
Then, Fuyumi-chan asks about Yuu-chan hanging out with a man the other day...
Source: crunchyroll
